alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 12:09AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Ellsworth County through 1245 AM CDT... At 1207 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lorraine, or 8 miles southwest of Kanopolis, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kanopolis, Geneseo, Lorraine, Kanopolis Lake and Kanopolis State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
